ticket.title: TestProcess#post not working for post-only routes.
ticket.original-body-html:
Using TestProcess#post (with rspec 1.3.0, rspec rails 1.3.2, Rails 2.3.8), I get routing errors if I call

post :action

for post-only routes (ie routes that don't respond to get, etc)

but not if I call

post :action, {:method => :post}
or
process :action, {:method => :post}

This is only an issue in testing, but it's annoying.
